metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11797 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.15 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.11, a carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an extremely long running computation when parsing the page tree.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfontbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2
libjempbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2
libpdfbox-java - 1:1.8.16-2
No subscription required

libfontbox2-java - 2.0.13-2
libpdfbox2-java - 2.0.13-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.8.16-2').
libpdfbox2-java package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.13-2').
